content: --प्रतिपक्षः ; (in logic) one of the five kinds of {%hetvābhāsas%} or fallacious {%hetus%}, a counter balanced {%hetu%}, one along which there exists another equal {%hetu%} on the opposite side; यत्र साध्याभावसाधकं हेत्वंतरं स सत्प्रतिपक्षः; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} ‘sound is eternal because it is audible’; and also ‘sound is non-eternal, because it is a product’.
